data.title: Senior Staff Bios
data.text:
Rob Shriver

Acting Director

Rob Shriver serves as the Acting Director of the U.S. Office of Personnel Management (OPM). View Bio

Gaby Alvarado

Special Advisor to the Deputy Director, Office of the Director

Gaby Alvarado serves as Special Advisor to the Deputy Director of the Office of Personnel Management (OPM) under the Biden-Harris Administration.View Bio

Tiffany Avila

Executive Assistant to the Chief of Staff, Office of the Director

Tiffany Avila serves as Executive Assistant to the Chief of Staff in the Office of the Director at the Office of Personnel Management under the Biden-Harris Administration. View Bio

Theo Chang

Senior Advisor for Strategic Initiatives, Office of the Director

Theodora (Theo) Chang serves as Senior Advisor for Strategic Initiatives at the Office of Personnel Management under the Biden-Harris Administration.View Bio

Margot Conrad

Deputy Chief of Staff, Office of the Director

Margot Conrad serves as the Deputy Chief of Staff for the Office of Personnel Management (OPM) under the Biden-Harris Administration. View Bio

Jon Foley

Senior Advisor to the Director, Office of the Director

Jonathan Foley is a Senior Advisor to the Director at the Office of Personnel Management (OPM). Immediately prior to his current appointment, Jon was co-founder and leader of a consulting firm...View Bio

Colleen Heller-Stein

Executive Director, Chief Human Capital Officers Council

Colleen Heller-Stein is the Executive Director of the Chief Human Capital Officers Council.View Bio

Ella Holman

Deputy Director, Chief Human Capital Officers (CHCO) Council, Office of the Director

Ella Holman is the Deputy Director of the CHCO Council where she serves as a key advisor to the CHCO Council Executive Director on the Councilâ€™s strategy, activity, and operations.View Bio

Erikka Knuti

Senior Advisor for Digital Transformation, Office of the Director

Erikka Knuti is the Senior Advisor for Digital Transformation at the Office of Personnel Management (OPM) under the Biden-Harris Administration.View Bio

Janice Rachel Lachance

Chair of the Federal Prevailing Rate Advisory Committee (FPRAC), Office of the Director

Janice Lachance was the Executive Vice President for Strategic Leadership and Global Outreach at the American Geophysical Union (AGU).View Bio

Jane Lee

Senior Advisor to the Director, Office of the Director

Jane Lee is a Senior Advisor to the Director at the Office of Personnel Management under the Biden-Harris Administration.View Bio

Yahaira Lopez

Senior Advisor for People Operations, Office of the Director

Yahaira Lopez is Senior Advisor for People Operations in the Office of the Director at the Office of Personnel Management under the Biden-Harris Administration.View Bio

Katie Malague

Chief Management Officer, Office of the Director

Katie Malague serves as the Chief Management Officer with the U.S. Office of Personnel Management (OPM).View Bio

Catherine Manfre

Chief Transformation Officer, Office of the Director

Catherine Manfre serves as Chief Transformation Officer at the Office of Personnel Management under the Biden-Harris Administration. View Bio

Anna Martin

Confidential Assistant, Office of the Director

Anna Martin serves as the Confidential Assistant to the Chief of Staff in the Office of the Director at the Office of Personnel Management (OPM) under the Biden-Harris Administration.View Bio

Dave Marsh

Chief of Staff

Dave Marsh serves as the Chief of Staff at the Office of Personnel Management (OPM) under the Biden-Harris Administration.View Bio

Emily Stanley

Special Advisor, Office of the Director

Emily Stanley serves as the Special Advisor to the Director at the Office of Personnel Management (OPM) under the Biden-Harris Administration.View Bio

Partha Teerdhala

Senior Advisor to the Director for Technology and Delivery, Office of the Director

Partha Teerdhala is the Senior Advisor to the Director for Technology and Delivery at the Office of Personnel Management (OPM) under the Biden-Harris Administration.View Bio

Jason Tengco

White House Liaison and Senior Advisor for Strategic Initiatives, Office of the Director

Jason Tengco is the White House Liaison and Senior Advisor for Strategic Initiatives for the Office of Personnel Management (OPM) under the Biden-Harris Administration.View Bio

Ryan Uyehara

Deputy Chief of Staff, Office of the Director

Ryan S. Uyehara serves as the Deputy Chief of Staff for the Office of Personnel Management (OPM) under the Biden-Harris Administration.View Bio

Tiffany Worthy

Senior Advisor for Leadership Development and Equity, Office of the Director

Tiffany Worthy is the Senior Advisor for Leadership Development and Equity at the Office of Personnel Management under the Biden-Harris Administration. View Bio

Desmond Brown

Director, Office of Small & Disadvantage Business Utilization

Desmond A. Brown is the Director of the Office of Small & Disadvantaged Business Utilization (OSDBU) for the U.S. Office of Personnel Management. View Bio

Eric Bursch

Director, Congressional, Legislative, and Intergovernmental Affairs

Eric Bursch is the Director of Congressional, Legislative and Intergovernmental Affairs (CLIA) at the Office of Personnel Management (OPM) under the Biden-Harris Administration. View Bio

Guy Cavallo

Chief Information Officer, Office of the Chief Information Officer

Guy Cavallo is the Chief Information Officer (CIO) of the Office of Personnel Management, appointed on July 2021.View Bio

Blake Davis

Senior Advisor, Congressional, Legislative, and Intergovernmental Affairs

Blake Davis serves as Senior Advisor to the Director of Congressional, Legislative, and Intergovernmental Affairs at the Office of Personnel Management under the Biden-Harris Administration.View Bio

Laura Goulding

Deputy Director, Office of Communications

Laura Goulding is the Deputy Director of Communications at the Office of Personnel Management. View Bio

Sharon Kwon

Policy Advisor, Congressional, Legislative, and Intergovernmental Affairs

Sharon Kwon serves as a Policy Advisor on the Congressional, Legislative, and Intergovernmental Affairs team at the Office of Personnel Management under the Biden-Harris Administration.View Bio

Dan Lindner

Senior Advisor and Chief Speechwriter, Office of Communications

Dan Lindner is Chief Speechwriter and Senior Advisor for Communications at the Office of Personnel Management. He is responsible for drafting remarks, talking points, and video scripts for OPM...View Bio

Webb Lyons

General Counsel, Office of the General Counsel

Webb Lyons is the General Counsel of the Office of Personnel Management under the Biden-Harris Administration. He previously served as the Deputy General Counsel.View Bio

Jackie Maffucci

Deputy Director, Congressional, Legislative, and Intergovernmental Affairs

Jackie Maffucci is the Deputy Director of Congressional, Legislative, and Intergovernmental Affairs at the Office of Personnel Management (OPM) under the Biden-Harris Administration.View Bio

Erica Roach

Chief Financial Officer, Office of the Chief Financial Officer

Erica Roach is the Chief Financial Officer (CFO) at the Office of Personnel Management. View Bio

Tanya Sehgal

Special Counsel and Senior Advisor, Office of the General Counsel

Tanya Sehgal is Special Counsel and Senior Advisor at the Office of Personnel Management under the Biden-Harris Administration. View Bio

Adam Tanga

Senior Advisor, Congressional, Legislative, and Intergovernmental Affairs

Adam Tanga serves as Senior Advisor in the Office of Congressional, Legislative, and Intergovernmental Affairs at the Office of Personnel Management (OPM) under the Biden-Harris Administration. View Bio

Viet Tran

Deputy Director, Office of Communications

Viet Tran is the Deputy Director for the Office of Communications at the Office of Personnel Management (OPM) under the Biden-Harris Administration.View Bio
